pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixed, Low-Rank, and Sparse Multivariate Regression on High- Dimensional Data // Mixed, low-rank, and sparse multivariate regression ('mixedLSR') provides tools for performing mixture regression when the coefficient matrix is low-rank and sparse. 'mixedLSR' allows subgroup identification by alternating optimization with simulated annealing to encourage global optimum convergence. This method is data-adaptive, automatically performing parameter selection to identify low- rank substructures in the coefficient matrix.
